DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Study L-T3 Utility Follow-up Patients With Thyroid Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: Patients well differentiate thyroid cancer ( DTC ) need whole-body scintigraphy ( WBS ) thyroglobulin ( Tg ) measurement order detect recurrence . Classically , withdrawal levothyroxine ( L-T4 ) 4-6 week need TSH elevation ( > 30mUI/L ) , allow iodine uptake Tg production . As result , patient become hypothyroid impaired quality life potential tumour flare-up . Recombinant hTSH WBS prevent hypothyroidism yet approve radioiodine treatment expensive therapy . L-T3 substitution first 2-3 week withdrawal alternative use empirically prepare patient ; however , data exists prove benefit upon reduce hypothyroidism . Objectives : 1 ) To compare hypothyroid state patient prepare either placebo L-T3 follow L-T4 withdrawal . 2 ) To evaluate time need TSH elevation ( > 30 mUI/L ) placebo vs. L-T3 . Method : At time L-T4 withdrawal thyroidectomy , patient DTC await WBS radioiodine treatment randomize two group ( double-blind ) : L-T3 ( 50 mg qd ) identical placebo 3 week , treatment stop 2 week . A validated questionnaire sign symptom hypothyroidism ( Billewicz 's scale ) administer every 2 week WBS . TSH , fT4 fT3 measure weekly .
